parameters.definition: Total amount of mRNA anti-viral available
Amount of mRNA per children's vaccine
Amount of mRNA per adult vaccine
Amount of fever suppressant per children's vaccine
Amount of fever suppressant per adult vaccine
Minimum proportion of vaccines as adult vaccines

description: A lab has \param{TotalMRna} mg of mRNA anti-viral available to make children's and adult vaccines. Each children's vaccine contains \param{MRnaPerChildVaccine} mg of mRNA and \param{FeverSuppressantPerChildVaccine} mg of fever suppressant. Each adult vaccine contains \param{MRnaPerAdultVaccine} mg of mRNA and \param{FeverSuppressantPerAdultVaccine} mg of fever suppressant. Since adult vaccines are more essential, at least \param{MinAdultVaccineProp} of vaccines should be adult vaccines. However, at least \param{MinChildVaccines} children's vaccines should be made. How many of each vaccine should be made to minimize the amount of fever suppressant used?
